block.name: Rail
block.doc: Sets a hard limit on the highest and lowest values at the output of this block. The effect is similar to an Op-Amp that is being driven to saturation (ie: to the rails).

param.name: Low clipping
param.doc: Sets the minimum value that will be output from this block.

param.name: Hi clipping
param.doc: Sets the maximum value that will be output from this block.
